name: Fast Rope Labs
description:
Fast Rope Labs is an elite research and development firm known for building amazing products and experiences at the intersection of hardware and software. We have built IoT, Wearable, Big Data, and Mobile products used by thousands of customers for consumer brands, government agencies, cities, non-profits, destinations, and well-known startups. 
Our team is comprised of veteran founders who have worked with some the world's most innovative companies, successfully raised capital and invested in startups.
